rule.name: accessprofilevideo
rule.title: Can not Access Profile Video
rule.description: Restrict users to Access Profile Video

rule.name: addprofilevideo
rule.title: Can not Add Profile Videos
rule.description: Restrict users to Add Profile Videos

rule.name: deleteprofilevideo
rule.title: Can not Delete Profile Video
rule.description: Restrict users to Delete Profile Video

rule.name: cantviewotherprofile
rule.title: Can not view Other's Profile
rule.description: Restrict users to view Other's Profile

rule.name: editselfprofile
rule.title: Can not Edit Self Profile
rule.description: Restrict users to Edit Self Profile

rule.name: editselfprofiledetails
rule.title: Can not Edit Self Profile Details
rule.description: Restrict users to Edit Self Profile Details

rule.name: statusbox
rule.title: Redirect to Change Status Message
rule.description: Redirect Users to Change Status Message

rule.name: aecredirect
rule.title: Redirect to AEC or Custom URL
rule.description: Redirect Users to AEC Subscription or Other Page

rule.name: redirect
rule.title: Redirect to AEC URL
rule.description: Redirect Users to AEC Subscription Page
